Description:
[PVE] ENEMY RUSH ver.13.5 / Share code [V7PEF].
[Latest changes]
add new enemy mod type FREEZER. This one weak firepower, but freeze you with surprise attack. Don't be alone! Keep teamwork!
[Get started]
Welcome to overcrowd PVE battles of 8player vs various AI bots hordes! huge kill streaks, rampages, intense bullet hell, beat big bosses with co-op! Choose unique HERO MODs to found synergy with your hero.
